teams.name: Sunrise Capital/CHFA:  Basis Points for Betterment
teams.loan_because: just a few basis points of capital directed by the global alternative investment industry toward microfinance can empower people all around the world.
teams.description: We are members of Sunrise Capital Partners, the California Hedge Fund Association, and the broader global alternative investment industry (or friends thereof) committed to generating economic opportunities around the world for all.
